To inherit global colors inside the modules, you can utilize {{theme.primary_color.color}} and {{theme.secondary_color.color}}. However, it is essential to ensure that you have already defined the corresponding global colors in the theme fields.json file in a similar manner. In case the path of global colors does not match the mentioned one, you have the option to use an alternate name in the theme fields.json file.

Refer to the attached images for how to define alternate names on theme fields.json.
